languages.text:
Один из пустотных кораблей на поле боя только что получил новый {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффект{/g}!
Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы активировать панель очередности слева, и выберите интересующий вас корабль, чтобы посмотреть список его эффектов. Чтобы узнать подробности о том или ином эффекте, нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
Один из пустотных кораблей на поле боя только что получил новый эффект!
Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы активировать панель инициативы слева, и выберите интересующий вас корабль, чтобы посмотреть список его эффектов. Чтобы узнать подробности о том или ином эффекте, нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text:
Один из пустотных кораблей на поле боя только что получил новый {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффект{/g}!
Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы активировать панель очередности слева, и выберите интересующий вас корабль, чтобы посмотреть список его эффектов. Чтобы узнать подробности о том или ином эффекте, нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the initiative panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the initiative panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the initiative panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

One of the voidships in battle has gained a new {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

One of the voidships in battle has gained a new {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
战斗中的某艘虚空舰获得了新的{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}！
按下{console_bind|LeftStickButton}{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}{/g}激活左边的行动顺序面板，之后选择任意舰船，即可查看该舰船当前受到的影响。若要了解更多相关信息，请按下{console_bind|Confirm}。
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
战斗中的某艘虚空舰获得了新的{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}！
按下{console_bind|LeftStickButton}激活左边的行动顺序面板，之后选择任意舰船，即可查看该舰船当前受到的影响。若要了解更多相关信息，请按下{console_bind|Confirm}。

languages.text:
戦闘中、ヴォイドシップが新たな{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を獲得！
{console_bind|LeftStickButton}を押して左側の{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}優先度{/g}パネルを起動し、船を選択してどのような効果を受けているか確認しよう。効果の詳細を確認するには、{console_bind|Confirm}を押そう。
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘中、ヴォイドシップが新たな{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を獲得！
{console_bind|LeftStickButton}を押して左側のイニシアチブパネルを起動し、船を選択してどのような効果を受けているか確認しよう。効果の詳細を確認するには、{console_bind|Confirm}を押そう。

languages.text:
¡Una de las naves del vacío en combate ha obtenido un nuevo {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g}!
Pulsa {console_bind|LeftStickButton} para activar el panel de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}prioridad{/g} a la izquierda y selecciona una nave para ver qué efectos tiene actualmente. Para obtener más información sobre un efecto, pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
¡Una de las naves del vacío en combate ha obtenido un nuevo {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}!
Pulsa {console_bind|LeftStickButton} para activar el panel de iniciativa a la izquierda y selecciona una nave para ver qué efectos tiene actualmente. Para obtener más información sobre un efecto, pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
Eines der Raumschiffe im Kampf hat einen neuen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} erlangt!
Drücke {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, um das {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}Priorität{/g}-Fenster auf der linken Seite zu aktivieren und wähle ein Schiff aus, um zu sehen, welche Effekte es gerade hat. Drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um mehr über einen Effekt zu erfahren.
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
Eines der Raumschiffe im Kampf hat einen neuen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} erlangt!
Drücke {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, um das Initiativfeld auf der linken Seite zu aktivieren und wähle ein Schiff aus, um zu sehen, welche Effekte es gerade hat. Drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um mehr über einen Effekt zu erfahren.

languages.text:
L'un des vaisseaux participant au combat a obtenu un nouvel {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} !
Appuyez sur {console_bind|LeftStickButton} pour activer le panneau de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priorité{/g} de gauche et sélectionnez le vaisseau pour connaître les effets dont il dispose. Pour en savoir plus sur un effet, appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text:
L'un des vaisseaux spatiaux participant au combat a obtenu un nouvel {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} !
Appuyez sur {console_bind|LeftStickButton} pour activer le panneau d'initiative de gauche et sélectionnez le vaisseau pour connaître les effets dont il dispose. Pour en savoir plus sur un effet, appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
Çatışmadaki uçsuz gemilerinden biri yeni bir {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etki{/g} kazandı!
{console_bind|LeftStickButton} düğmesine basarak soldaki {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}öncelik{/g} panelini etkinleştir ve bir gemi seçerek üzerinde mevcutta hangi etkilerin bulunduğunu gör. Bir etki hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinmek için {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine bas.
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}!
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left and select a ship to see what effects are currently on them. To learn more about an effect, press {console_bind|Confirm}.
